portfolio.title: Bmi-Calculator
portfolio.description: I have developed a simple BMI calculator using the Flutter framework. The calculator helps users calculate their Body Mass Index (BMI) based on their height and weight.With this app,it will instantly calculate their BMI. The app is easy to use and provides accurate results.
